title: Polling Officials To Trek 39 Km For Lone Voter In Arunachal Malogam Village
selftext:
Polling Officials To Trek 39 Km For Lone Voter In Arunachal Village

https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/polling-officials-to-trek-39-km-for-lone-voter-in-arunachal-malogam-village-5320474
comments: Why not appoint a nodal officer and collect his postal ballot? Surely sending a poll team is more expensive for the exchequer than a simple postal ballot? Provided, of course, the person concerned is willing to vote.
